[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I really enjoy being a carpenter. It's a very fulfilling job.

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Dream of Becoming a Singer', 'Related Summaries': 'Classmates A expresses interest in pursuing a singing career and receives support from Classmates B.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Classmates A: , I felt really inspired after singing my song again. I think I want to pursue my dream of becoming a singer. ### Classmates B: That's amazing,! I had no idea you had such a passion for singing. ### Classmates A: Yeah, it's always been something I've loved to do. But I never really thought it was possible until now. ### Classmates B: Well, I fully support you in pursuing your dream. Have you thought about what steps you need to take to make it happen? ### Classmates A: Actually, I've been doing some research and I found some vocal coaches in the area. I think I might reach out to them and see if they can help me improve my singing. ### Classmates B: That's a great idea! And have you looked into any local open mic nights or talent showcases where you can perform and start to build a following? ### Classmates A: I have, actually. There's a cafe down the street that has an open mic night every Thursday. I'm thinking about signing up to perform next week. ### Classmates B: That's amazing! I would love to come and support you. And who knows, maybe we can even collaborate on a song in the future. ### Classmates A: I would love that,! It's so great to have supportive friends who encourage me to pursue my dreams.' }
```
